me pilibandawa lipiyak sapayana kodi brawun nam wicharakaya, nuduru anagathayedi robo krida janapriyawimata hethuwana karunu 5k gena hara dakwanawa. 1] robo thakshanaya wegayen wadidiyunuwima, kruthrima buddhiya jangama durakathanayakata sangruhitha kalahaki lesa wardhanayawima (uda: ayifonaye siri, windos fonaye kotana ha androyid hi gugal woyis), robowange hakiyawan wegayen wadidiyunuwima ha ema wegayenma robo thakshanaye mila pahalayama. 2] siyaluma aakarawala swayankriya robo thakshanaya sandaha diyunu ratawal menma chinaya wani ratawalda dolar biliyana gananin aayojanaya kirima ha elesa wadidiyunuwana robo thakshanaya wadikal nogos wanijakaranayawi welandapolata paminima wanija robo thakshanaya diyunuwima. 3] samawitama nawothpadanayanta aayojanaya karannata kamathi tharuna prakotipathiyan athiwishala pramanayak pasugiya dashaka kihipayathula bihiwima.
